divs: Sighting DetailsI watched the craft as it moved south a little, stopping every so often and hovering for about 5 minutes, then it came to a dead stop. It hovered there for about 4 minutes and I started to get my co workers attention, before she could find it in the sky it darted straight for a cloud bank that was between where I was and the Mt. St. Helens Volcano.
Summary: Silver Cigar shape over mountains near Mt. St. Helens
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rainier
There were no other sightings in Rainier on or around August 17th 2009
